title: Transportation and Mobility
prompt: A worn pickup truck sits parked on a quiet country road at golden hour, its hood angled toward distant hills under overcast sky. Weathered hands rest on the steering wheel, visible through the open window; the interior shows maps, a thermos, worn seat coversâ€”evidence of countless miles. The landscape stretches empty behind, a two-lane highway disappearing into flat farmland with telephone poles marking the vast space between destinations. Shot from a low angle emphasizing the vehicle's essential role in the vast rural terrain, documentary style with natural, muted color grading that captures the weight of distance and dependence.
